name: Trippy Hippy
description:
TrIppy Hippy is a single player game set in a dull, dull universe.

The only thing making it liveable for you is the supply of mushrooms! Keep the trip alive and fight back against hallucinations and wonder at passing mirages.

  • Traverse small "planets" to progress
  • Keep consuming mushrooms!
  • Stay away from pills!
  • Fight against your mind in shooting sequences

We hope you enjoy the trip.

*Second year University project*
